dublin_core.dcvalue: Women s College Hospital WCH offers specialized surgical procedures including ambulatory breast reconstruction in post mastectomy breast cancer patients Most patients receiving ambulatory surgery have low rates of postoperative events necessitating clinic visits Increasingly mobile monitoring and follow up care is used to overcome the distance patients must travel to receive specialized care at a reduced cost to society WCH has completed a feasibility study using a mobile app QoC Health Inc Toronto that suggests high patient satisfaction and adequate detection of postoperative complications
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-07T13:33:04Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2014-09-23
Replacing ambulatory surgical follow-up visits with mobile app home monitoring: modeling cost-effective scenarios.
